title: Can we not?
body:
Guys,

This is my champ select ALL THE TIME:

[summ1]
:  oi lilmisspurdey
[summ1]
:  let me ad
lilmisspurdey
Brah?
:  k
[summ2]  hey lilmisspurdey
[summ2]  suck me d
[summ1]
:  wanna join discord?
[summ3] what is discord?
[summ2] hav sum phn sex


There is no way to report this, it's annoying, please grow up.

replies.body:
Post game reporting will now review pre and post game lobby chat on OCE, so reporting post game will take this into account :) 
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/RHaLh1FE-suspension-without-cause?comment=0006

Failing that (or if you dodge the lobby) you can also submit a report to player support (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They won't give you any info about another person's account though, so you'll just get a generic "thanks for your report" kinda repsonse.
Thanks I wasn't aware of that :)
